OgrePlatform.h

00025 #ifndef __Platform_H_
00026 #define __Platform_H_
00027 
00028 #include "OgreConfig.h"
00029 
00030 /* Initial platform/compiler-related stuff to set.
00031 */
00032 #define PLATFORM_WIN32 1
00033 #define PLATFORM_LINUX 2
00034 #define PLATFORM_APPLE 3
00035 
00036 #define COMPILER_MSVC 1
00037 #define COMPILER_GNUC 2
00038 #define COMPILER_BORL 3
00039 
00040 /* Finds the compiler type and version.
00041 */
00042 #if defined( _MSC_VER )
00043 #   define OGRE_COMPILER COMPILER_MSVC
00044 #   define OGRE_COMP_VER _MSC_VER
00045 
00046 #elif defined( __GNUC__ )
00047 #   define OGRE_COMPILER COMPILER_GNUC
00048 #   define OGRE_COMP_VER __VERSION__
00049 
00050 #elif defined( __BORLANDC__ )
00051 #   define OGRE_COMPILER COMPILER_BORL
00052 #   define OGRE_COMP_VER __BCPLUSPLUS__
00053 
00054 #else
00055 #   pragma error "No known compiler. Abort! Abort!"
00056 
00057 #endif
00058 
00059 /* Hack to get the release version of STLport 4.5.3 to compile when using
00060    the release build in VC7.   
00061 */
00062 #if OGRE_COMPILER == COMPILER_MSVC
00063     // Has to be nested because some compilers return strings for their version
00064 #   if OGRE_COMP_VER == 1300
00065 #       define _STLP_LIB_BASENAME "stlport_vc7"
00066 #   endif
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 /* See if we can use __forceinline or if we need to use __inline instead */
00070 #if OGRE_COMPILER == COMPILER_MSVC 
00071 #   if OGRE_COMP_VER >= 1200
00072 #       define FORCEINLINE __forceinline
00073 #   endif
00074 #else
00075 #   define FORCEINLINE __inline
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 /* Finds the current platform - note Apple is not yet
00079    searched for.
00080 */
00081 #if defined( __WIN32__ ) || defined( _WIN32 )
00082 #   define OGRE_PLATFORM PLATFORM_WIN32
00083 #else
00084 #   define OGRE_PLATFORM PLATFORM_LINUX
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 // For generating compiler warnings - should work on any compiler
00088 // As a side note, if you start your message with 'Warning: ', the MSVC
00089 // IDE actually does catch a warning :)
00090 #define _QUOTE_INPLACE_(x) # x
00091 #define QUOTE(x) _QUOTE_INPLACE_(x)
00092 #define warn( x )  message( __FILE__ "(" QUOTE( __LINE__ ) ") : " x "\n" )
00093 
00094 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 // Windows Settings
00096 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == PLATFORM_WIN32
00098 #   if OGRE_DYNAMIC_LINKAGE == 0
00099 #       define _OgreExport
00100 #   elif defined( OGREMAIN_EXPORTS )
00101 #       define _OgreExport __declspec(dllexport)
00102 #   else
00103 #       define _OgreExport __declspec(dllimport)
00104 #   endif
00105 #endif // OGRE_WIN32
00106 
00107 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 // Linux Settings
00109 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00110 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == PLATFORM_LINUX
00111 #    define _OgreExport
00112 #    define stricmp strcasecmp
00113 #endif // OGRE_LINUX
00114 
00115 
00116 #endif
